english_example_sentence: Dear guests, you would want to read this beautiful book.
russian_example_sentence: Дорогие гости, вы бы хотели прочитать эту прекрасную книгу.
turkish_example_sentence: Değerli misafirler, bu güzel kitabı okumak istersiniz.
